common.evaluation_warning: You must complete device evaluation to enroll in device protection. Your progress will be saved for %d minutes.
common.offer_warning:
You can continue, but your
offer will be lower.
common.skip_step: Got it, skip to the next step
common.invalid_phonenumber: Please type a valid phone number
common.privacy: We don't store or share any images taken from your device.

connection.title: No internet connection
connection.subtitle: Please check your connection and try again

screen_test_page.evaluate_description: Next you’ll swipe around the entire screen to reveal the hidden image.

agreements.caption: Before you continue
agreements.title: We value your privacy
agreements.subtitle:
To enroll in device protection, we'll collect data and use your camera to assess your device's condition.
No images used for evaluation will be collected or stored. Review our Privacy Notice to learn how we handle your data.

thank_you_page.title: Thank you!
thank_you_page.description: A member of the Pandas team will get back to you shortly.

list_item_1.title: Remove the case from the device you want to evaluate.

list_item_3.title: Make sure your secondary device has access to data or wi-fi.

list_item_4.title: If you exit the app before finishing, you’ll need to start over.

list_item_1.title: Remove the case from the device you want to evaluate.

list_item_3.title: Make sure your the device you want to evaluate has access to data or wi-fi.

list_item_4.title: If you exit the app before finishing, you’ll need to start over.

list_item_1.title: Remove your device from its case.

list_item_2.title: Stand in front of a mirror.

list_item_3.title: Make sure the area is well-lit and in a quiet, private space.

list_item_4.title: If you exit the app before finishing, you’ll need to start over.

what_you_need_page.subtitle: Before we start.
what_you_need_page.title: What you will need to evaluate your

list_item_1.title: Set up your FaceID or TouchID

list_item_2.title: Have access to a mirror
list_item_2.description: We know this may sound a bit strange at the moment :)

list_item_3.title: Stay in a quite place for 5'

what_you_need_page.footer_text:
We respect your personal information.
Read our

root.wrong_edge_left: Move phone a bit to the left
root.wrong_edge_right: Move phone a bit to the right

front_camera_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your camera doesn't work?
front_camera_page.evaluate_description: Check the condition of your front camera using a clean mirror.
front_camera_page.evaluate_description_store: Check the condition of your front camera by detecting your face with it.

allow_camera_page.title: Allow camera access
allow_camera_page.description: Access is needed to capture images and evaluate the condition of your device.

deny_alert.title: Not allowing access to your camera will terminate the evaluation
deny_alert.description: You need to complete evaluation to get the device protection plan

retry_alert.title: Allow %@ to access your camera
retry_alert.message: Required to capture images and test the condition of your device.

image_preview_page.heading: Is the phone completely visible and in focus?
image_preview_page.tooltip_message: Make sure the photo is clear and not blurred so we can evaluate the cosmetic condition of your phone fairly. Otherwise, you may run the risk of getting a lower offer.

modal.title: Oh snap...
modal.description: If we don’t evaluate your Camera, we’ll have to give you lower trade in quote.

instructions.title: Turn your device around
instructions.description: Turn your phone around, so the front-facing camera is pointing at a mirror.

instructions_store.title: Position your face within frame
instructions_store.description: A quick check that your front camera is working. Smile:)

back_camera_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your camera doesn't work?
back_camera_page.evaluate_description: Check the condition of your back camera using a clean mirror. Please remove your case.
back_camera_page.evaluate_description_store: Check the condition of your back camera by detcting an object inside the store.

front.description: Capture the front of the device

back.description: Capture the back of the device

modal.title: Oh snap...
modal.description: If we don’t evaluate your Camera, we’ll have to give you lower trade in quote.

instructions.title: Hold your device with the tip of your fingers

instructions_store.description: Point the camera to any object. Just wait for the AI to identify it.

skip_modal.title: Oh snap?...
skip_modal.description: If we don’t evaluate your touch screen, we’ll have to give you lower trade in quote.

digitizer_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your touch screen doesn't work?
digitizer_page.evaluate_description: Check the digitizer condition of your device
digitizer_page.footer_message: My touch screen is not fully functional

instructions.description: Swipe around the entire screen to reveal the hidden image.

modal_swiping.title: Keep swiping!
modal_swiping.description: You have to swipe your screen from edge to edge!

modal_touch_not_working.title: It seems that your touch screen isn't fully functional...
modal_touch_not_working.description: You have to swipe your screen from edge to edge!

multitouch_page.title: Multitouch gestures
multitouch_page.description: Check the functionality of your screen's multitouch gestures.
multitouch_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your multitouch doesn’t work?

instructions.title: Let’s check your screen’s multitouch!
instructions.description: Tap on the popup and touch your screen with 2 fingers

test_multitouch_page.instructions_three_fingers: Great! Now, touch your screen with 3 fingers

retry_modal.title: I didn’t sense any touch...
retry_modal.description: You have to touch the device with two fingers

fail_modal.title: It seems that screen multitouch isn’t fully functional...

sound_performance_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your microphone doesn't work?
sound_performance_page.evaluate_description:
Let's make sure your microphone and speakers are working properly.
• Find a quiet place
• Turn off Bluetooth to any external microphone, speaker, or hearing aids.

allow_microphone_page.title: Allow microphone access
allow_microphone_page.description: Access is needed to evaluate the sound quality of your device.
allow_microphone_page.privacy_message: We don't store or share any audio from your device. Your data is safe and private.

deny_alert.title: Not allowing access to your microphone will terminate the evaluation
deny_alert.description: You need to complete evaluation to get the device protection plan

retry_alert.title: Allow %@ to access your microphone
retry_alert.message: Required to test the sound quality of your device.

skip_modal.title: Oh snap?...
skip_modal.description: If we don't evaluate your microphone, we'll have to give you lower trade in quote.

items_list.item_3: Make sure your smartphone is not connected to headsets or airpods
items_list.item_4: Make sure you turn down loud sounds from other devices

not_working_modal.title: It seems that your audio isn't fully functional...

content_volume_up.title: Turn the volume up to 100%
content_volume_up.description: Make sure you're in a quiet place, then tap 'Start'.

sound_check.title: Checking speakers and microphone
sound_check.description: Your phone will make some sounds to make sure your hardware is working properly.

face_id_page.skip_modal_title: Are you sure your Face ID doesn't work?
face_id_page.setup_modal_title: It’s ok, you can set up your biometrics now!
face_id_page.setup_modal_description: Tap on the button to see how to set up your device’s biometrics
face_id_page.evaluate_description: Assess the biometrics functionality of your device.
face_id_page.no_face_id: I haven’t set up my Biometrics

allow_face_id_page.title: Allow biometrics access
allow_face_id_page.description: Required access to test the functionality of your device's biometrics.
allow_face_id_page.privacy_message: We will never share biometric data taken from your device. Your data are safe and private.

skip_modal.title: Oh snap...
skip_modal.description: If we don’t evaluate your Face ID, we’ll have to give you lower trade in quote.

error_modal.title: It’s ok, you can test your biometrics now!
error_modal.description: Tap on the button to test your device’s biometrics

instructions.title: Tap on the icon
instructions.description: Tap on the Face ID icon to activate your smartphone’s biometrics.

items_list.item_2: Sign in to your Apple ID account
items_list.item_3: Turn On Sync on iCloud Passwords & Keychain.

device_motion_page.evaluate_description: Check the functionality of your device's accelerometer and gyroscope.

skip_modal.title: Are you sure your sensors don’t work?

intro_modal.title: Tilt your device
intro_modal.description: Try to hit all the marks with the ball

warning_modal.title: I didn’t sense any movement...
warning_modal.description: You have to tilt the device

fail_modal.title: It seems that your device's sensors aren't fully functional...

test_device_motion_page.heading: Move the ball to hit the target

reveal_imei_page.title: Almost done!
reveal_imei_page.description: One last thing! Please follow the next steps to reveal the IMEI number of your device.

help_list.title: Next steps
help_list.step_1: Tap the button to display your IMEI.
help_list.step_3: Put your phone back in the drawer with this screen on.

top_title_price.title: Submit your IMEI to get an accurate price
top_title_price.description:
Submit your IMEI to
get an accurate price

top_title.title: Almost done!
top_title.description: In order to finallize the assement, we need you to provide us with your device’s IMEI. Find the IMEI number, copy it, and paste it below.

status_message_shell.message_2: Just a moment,</br>we’re preparing your quote.

top_title.title: Get your quote.
top_title.description: Enter your email so as to forward our offer to your inbox as too.

offer_page.modal_title: We are sorry, we don’t buy your smartphone at the moment.
offer_page.final_price: The final price will be determined after the final evaluation of the device. You have %@ days to claim the offer.
offer_page.info_price_description: The offer we give you is calculated based on the condition of your device, as well as characteristics such as its brand, the model, and its capacity. Additionally, in collaboration with the biggest marketplaces of refurbished devices, we check the demand of your phone in the market. We Pandas keep a fee (avg. 10% of the price offered) to evaluate and transport your device and you get paid in less than 3'.
offer_page.info_final_offer_description: "Final Offer" is the most accurate price that Pandas can offer after inspecting the device's front and back cosmetics due to the online grading process. To get a "Binding Offer", customers should ship the device by mail or visit a Pandas Partner's associate for a final inspection using Pandas technology.
offer_page.evaluation_warning: Your offer remains valid for %@ days so that you can complete your trade in at store. If you wish to run a new round of diagnostic checks you can click below. The updated diagnostic results will override any previous ones.

mirror_walkthrough_page.title: What you will need before you start

slide_3.title: Avoid covering the device with your fingers

slide_4.title: Remove cases, damaged screen protectors etc

peer_qr_cosmetic.title: Scan the QR code with your secondary device
peer_qr_cosmetic.subtitle: We’ll use your secondary device’s camera to take a quick look at the condition of this device.

peer_qr_functional.title: Scan the QR code with the device you want to enroll
peer_qr_functional.subtitle:
To enroll your device in protection, we’ll need to check its screen and sound condition.
Make sure the device you want to enroll has access to data or wi-fi.

peer_cosmetic_condition_page.title: Check device condition
peer_cosmetic_condition_page.description:
Let’s take a quick look at your device.
You’ll capture images of the front and back of your device to check for damage. We’ll then evaluate the touch screen, microphone, and speakers.

cosmetic_condition_page.title: Take a picture in a mirror
cosmetic_condition_page.description: Let's check the device you want to enroll in protection using a mirror to capture images of the front and back.

cosmetic_d2d_condition_page.title: Use another device
cosmetic_d2d_condition_page.description: Let's check the device you want to enroll in protection using a secondary device to capture images of the front and back.

cosmetic_condition_test.error_title: Unfortunately, we couldn't use your images for evaluation
cosmetic_condition_test.error_subtitle: Please retake the photos in a well-lit area. Remember to remove the case and ensure the images are focused and centered.

errors.photos-error: Something is wrong with the photos
errors.no-ocr-screen: The IMEl is not displayed on the screen
errors.out-of-focus: Please ensure the photo of the device is clear and in focus.
errors.brightness: Please capture device photo in brighter environment.
errors.device-not-visible: Please ensure the device is clearly visible on the captured photo
errors.accessories: Please remove visible stickers and/or damaged screen protectors/covers
errors.device-holding: Please ensure your hands do not cover the front screen of the device.

finished.title: Front and back check complete!
finished.subtitle: Now, let’s move on to the touch screen and sound tests.

front_condition_page.title: Front Condition
front_condition_page.description: Check the condition of your front camera using a clean mirror.

device_turns_on.title: Does your device open and function properly?

yes.title: Yes
yes.description: My device opens and functions properly

no.title: No
no.description: My device doesn’t open or functions properly

cosmetic_options.title: Check device condition
cosmetic_options.subtitle: Let’s take a quick look at your device. You’ll capture images of the front and back of your device to check for damage. We’ll then evaluate the touch screen, microphone, and speakers.

success.description: Great news! Your device is eligible for protection.

failure.description: Unfortunately this device is not eligible for device protection
failure.reason: We found an issue with the %@ during the evaluation.

lcd_condition.title: Is the device free from liquid damage and LCD bleeds?
lcd_condition.description: Inspect your device carefully and choose from the options below to answer.

back_condition_page.title: Back Condition
back_condition_page.description: Check the condition of your back camera using a clean mirror. Please remove your case.

grading_answers_list_page.title: Let’s try again!
grading_answers_list_page.description: Improve the items on the list bellow so we can have better photos of your device

answers.out-of-focus: Please ensure the photo of the device is clear and in focus.
answers.brightness: Please capture device photo in brighter environment.
answers.device-not-visible: Please ensure the device is clearly visible on the captured photo
answers.accessories: Please remove visible stickers and/or damaged screen protectors/covers
answers.device-holding: Please ensure your hands do not cover the front screen of the device.

option_home.title: Trade in from home
option_home.description: A Pandas rider will pick up your smartphone from your preferred location.

option_courier.title: Drop off at Courier
option_courier.description:
Ship your phone to us
via courier partners.

option_atm.title: Trade in at a Pandas kiosk
option_atm.description: Drop off your device at the nearest Pandas kiosk.

option_courier_at_store.title: Drop off @ Courier
option_courier_at_store.description: We will arrange a courier to pick up your device from your place. Your device will be evaluated within a day.

option_at_store.title: Drop off @ Store
option_at_store.description: Drop off your device at the nearest %@ store and get a voucher instantly!

personal_info_page.title: Personal info
personal_info_page.description: Enter your personal info to continue
